Answers.Answer: True
False

Question: What should you do if you meet animals coming towards you on the road?

Answers.Answer: Slow down and move over to the left side of the road
Give a long blast with the horn on your vehicle
Give a lot of short toots with the horn on your vehicle
Race your vehicle engine

Question: What is the meaning of a yellow broken line painted on the road near the kerb?

Answers.Answer: You may not pass
Only trucks may park here
You may stop for no more than 5 minutes
No vehicles may stop here

Question: What must you do if you want to turn right at traffic signals where a green light is showing?

Answers.Answer: Push your way through the vehicles coming towards you
Give way to vehicles coming towards you
Wait until the lights change to red and then turn quickly
Turn at once as the vehicles coming towards you will be stopped

Question: The bonnet of your vehicle lifts up while you are driving and you cannot see. What should you do?

Answers.Answer: Turn your vehicle headlights on and look out of the side window
Brake smoothly and move over to the left side of the road
Steer your vehicle straight ahead and stop as quickly as you can
Speed up and move to the left side of the road

Question: What must you do if you intend to move your vehicle from the right-hand lane to the left-hand lane?

Answers.Answer: Move to the left as quickly as possible
Speed up and signal as you move to the left
Signal for at least 3 seconds before moving left
Slow down and signal as you move to the left

Answers.Answer: True
False

Answers.Answer: Yes
No

Question: What must you do at an intersection controlled by a Stop sign?

Answers.Answer: Come to a complete stop
Slow down and be prepared to stop
Stop only if you can do so safely
Continue driving unless you can see an oncoming vehicle

Answers.Answer: Yes – if you drive at less than 20km/h
Yes – if you put a white flag on the right-hand corner
Yes – if you think it will not come off the trailer
No – not at all

No

Question: What does it mean if yellow traffic signals are flashing?

Answers.Answer: That a crash has just happened
The traffic signals are not working, apply the give way rules
Vehicles may only proceed straight ahead and not turn
Emergency vehicles are about to come through

Question: What should you do when another vehicle is following you very closely?

Answers.Answer: Speed up to get further ahead
Brake suddenly to warn them
Flick your vehicle lights and wave your arm
Slow down, move to the left and allow the vehicle to pass

Question: What should you do when you come up to a one-lane bridge?

Slow down and check for any oncoming vehicles before driving on
Drive on and make sure any oncoming vehicles reverse off the bridge

Question: A police officer has the power to arrest you for:

Answers.Answer: failing to supply your correct name and address
having no warrant of fitness for your vehicle
failing to signal a right turn
failing to stop at a stop sign

Question: When you have a learner licence you do not have to have it with you when you drive if your supervisor has their licence with them.

False

Question: You are the driver of the blue car. What must you do?

Stop and give way to the cyclist

Question: Which parts of the car must be in good condition to prevent too much noise and gases entering the car?

Answers.Answer: Good mud guards and mud flaps
A good silencer and exhaust system
Good sun visors and windscreen
An efficient carburettor and heater

Question: What is the maximum distance a load may extend in front of a car?

4 metres from the front edge of the front seat
5 metres from the front edge of the front seat

In a secure place
